tabs.tab_content:
• Royal Blue FR twill weave
  • 90% Cotton / 10% Nylon

• Aramid high tenacity FR thread
  • Bar-tacked at all stress pointsAll metal thermally protected from the skin
  • Bar-tacked at all stress points
  • Protective shirt collar
  • Heavy duty brass zipper on aramid tape
  • Two-way #5 zipper at CF
  • Storm guard over front zipper with snaps closure
  • Side elasticized waist
• 2 flap chest patch pockets with snap closure

• CAN/CGSB 155.22-2014
  • UL Certified for CAN/CGSB 155.20-2000
  • CSA Z462-2015
  • CSA Z96-09
  • NFPA 1975-2014
  • UL Certified for NFPA 2112-2012
  • ASTM F1506-02a
  • OSHA 29 CFR1910.269
  • OEKO-TEX Standard 100
